channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Looking back at Jim Morrison's history-making summit down Mount Everest
item.description: Will Reeve looks back at Jim Morrison's history-making descent down Mount Everest's most challenging route as part of Robin Roberts’ primetime special...

item.title: George Clooney, his wife and their twins granted French citizenship
item.description: France's government says that George Clooney, his wife Amal and their eight-year-old twins Ella and Alexander have been awarded French citizenship.

item.title: Japan's prime minister moves into "haunted" official residence
item.description: Japanese premiere Sanae Takaichi has moved into the prime minister's official residence, where ghosts of Japanese soldiers from a century ago are repu...

item.title: Viral video prompts fraud probe at Minnesota day care centers
item.description: While many of the Minnesota day care centers in the video were cited and fined for safety violations, investigators previously found no evidence of fr...

item.title: Russian official threatens Zelenskyy as Moscow claims Kyiv attacked Putin residence
item.description: A top Russian official on Monday issued personal threats against Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

item.title: Scammers notched $333 million from bitcoin ATM scams in 2025, FBI says
item.description: The FBI says fraudsters in 2025 bilked Americans out of more than $333 million with ruses perpetrated using bitcoin ATM machines.

item.title: WATCH: Thief returns stolen mandolins to guitar store with apology note
item.description: In a sobering decision, one drunk thief apparently changed his tune and returned two mandolins that he had previously stolen, according to the owner o...

item.title: China's top diplomat blasts US arms sale to Taiwan as military drills unfold
item.description: China’s top diplomat has slammed a record U.S. military sale to Taiwan

item.title: New California tortilla law aims to decrease birth defects in Latino babies
item.description: Mom-and-pop shops will be exempt from this change, but big manufacturers in California will need to start adding folic acid to tortillas beginning Jan...

item.title: 12/29: CBS Evening News
item.description: Massive winter storm generates life-threatening conditions across U.S.; Trump warns "hell to pay" if Hamas doesn't disarm.
